roles.title: Web Editor Lead
responsibilities: Developed and maintained a web editor; optimized for 40+ client companies with features like undo/redo cursor fixes, table resizing, and image optimization.
Led 3-stage refactoring to improve maintainability and performance, streamlining code, CSS, and APIs.
Built an installable document platform, implementing features such as tree menus, search, real-time thumbnails, and JSON-based data compression.

roles.title: EDMS Admin System
responsibilities: Developed an enterprise admin system for a major insurance company, handling 1.5M daily file uploads with optimized multithreading and data encryption (AES256, SHA-512).
Designed and implemented high-traffic support, secure session handling, and cron-based log monitoring.
Set up Oracle on AWS EC2, replicating client infrastructure.

roles.title: Internal Design System
responsibilities: Standardized UI components, color palettes, and typography for consistent design across solutions, improving usability and visual cohesion.
Managed 3 core programs and led client workshops to support startups tackling public challenges, addressing technical limitations.
Achieved the AWS Cloud Practitioner certification, strengthening IT knowledge and improving communication with internal teams and clients.
Developed and executed programs, including the ‘Startup Challenge,’ generating US$30K profit in 2021.
